name: Foot Cuisine
description:
Foot Cuisine Description

You play as the Chef of a new Restaurant know for its Foot Cuisine where you kick the ingredients for extra saveur.

A Game made For the Mini Game Jam 94

How To Play

You move around as the chef and the goal is to knock the ingredients spread out through the floor into the Pots. 

Controls

Left Mouse Button to Move the Chef -> Hold For More Speed

Right Mouse Button to Kick the Ingredients -> Hold For More Speed

(You can only Kick the Ingredients when inside their range)

F11 -> Full screen

Credits

A Game Made Mostly By Your's Truely, a Really Okey Fruit.

Music
